name: Sunder
flavorText: A weapon of myth and legend. Some say that to use it is folly—that it will rip the land asunder and boil the oceans.
flavorTextHtml: A weapon of myth and legend. Some say that to use it is folly—that it will rip the land asunder and boil the oceans.

secondary.textHtml: [25 - 50]% chance to sunder the ground your enemies walk on when you attack.
